name: ODRefreshControl
summary: A pull down to refresh control like the one in Apple's iOS6 Mail App.
description:
「   converted automatically by plugin cocoapods-imy-bin @厦门美柚 - slj    」
 ODRefreshControl is a "pull down to refresh" control for UIScrollView,like the one Apple introduced in iOS6, but available to anyone from iOS4 and up.
